content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am trying to get the highest price possible for this apartment. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I can offer 500 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Max. However, I am looking for a higher price. How about 600 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, but 600 euros per month is too high for me. I can offer 550 euros per month as a compromise.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am willing to negotiate, Max. How about 575 euros per month? This is as low as I am willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 575 euros per month is still too high for me. I can offer 560 euros per month as a compromise.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max. However, 560 euros per month is still too low for me. I can meet you in the middle at 580 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 580 euros per month is a better offer, but I believe 570 euros per month is more reasonable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to accept 575 euros per month. Let's make this deal official.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 575 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [575] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
